project.description: eMonocot aims to create a global online resource for monocot plants. It will provide a focus for taxonomists working on monocots and will help people discover information about monocots by providing tools for identification, up-to-date checklists, descriptions and links to other resources.
project.name: eMonocot

developer.name: Ben Clark
developer.organization: Department of Zoology, University of Oxford

developer.name: Joseph Kelly
developer.organization: Science Applications, IT Department, Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew
